resources.string: Camera permission allows you to take pictures and capture videos. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Record audio permission allows you to record audios. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Modify audio permission allows us access to your audios. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Write External permission allows us access to your media. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Read External permission allows us to read your media. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Read Contacts permission allows us to read your contacts. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Write Contacts permission allows you access to your contacts. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Vibrate permission . Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Receive sms permission allows you to receive SMS messages. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Read sms permission allows us access to your SMS messages. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Call phone permission allows you make calls. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Get accounts permission . Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Write Sync settings permission . Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Read Sync settings permission . Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.

By Sigining up you agree to our T&C

Terms and Conditions are a set of rules and guidelines that a user must agree to in order to use your website or mobile app. It acts as a legal contract between you (the company) who has the website or mobile app and the user who access your website and mobile app. It’s up to you to set the rules and guidelines that the user must agree to. You can think of your Terms and Conditions agreement as the legal agreement where you maintain your rights to exclude users from your app in the event that they abuse your app, and where you maintain your legal rights against potential app abusers, and so on. Terms and Conditions are also known as Terms of Service or Terms of Use. This type of legal agreement can be used for both your website and your mobile app. It’s not required (it’s not recommended actually) to have separate Terms and Conditions agreements: one for your website and one for your mobile app.Terms and Conditions are a set of rules and guidelines that a user must agree to in order to use your website or mobile app. It acts as a legal contract between you (the company) who has the website or mobile app and the user who access your website and mobile app. It’s up to you to set the rules and guidelines that the user must agree to. You can think of your Terms and Conditions agreement as the legal agreement where you maintain your rights to exclude users from your app in the event that they abuse your app, and where you maintain your legal rights against potential app abusers, and so on. Terms and Conditions are also known as Terms of Service or Terms of Use. This type of legal agreement can be used for both your website and your mobile app. It’s not required (it’s not recommended actually) to have separate Terms and Conditions agreements: one for your website and one for your mobile app.
A Privacy Policy agreement is the agreement where you specify if you collect personal data, what kind of personal data you collect from users and what you do with that data.

Welcome to our SAANPAY.in android APP. If you continue to browse and use this App you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern [business name]\'s relationship with you in relation to this App. The term \'[business name]\' or \'us\' or \'we\' refers to the owner of the website whose registered office is [address]. Our company registration number is [company registration number and place of registration]. The term \'you\' refers to the user or viewer of our App.
